title: Fix admin dashboard routing and loading issues

requirements.text: Fix the /admin route configuration to ensure the admin dashboard page loads correctly in Chrome browser when visiting https://5t3nc-iiaaa-aaaap-qkmaq-cai.icp0.io/admin

quotes: if i am searching in chrome but it's not opening it's not showing anything
you're copying the full URL https://5t3nc-iiaaa-aaaap-qkmaq-cai.icp0.io/admin into Chrome, but the page isn't loading or displaying anything

acceptanceCriteria: The /admin URL loads successfully in Chrome without blank pages or errors
The admin dashboard page renders and displays content correctly
No browser console errors related to routing

requirements.text: Ensure the admin dashboard displays all booking requests in a table format with columns for customer name, phone number, service type, address, and submission date
acceptanceCriteria: All booking requests are fetched and displayed in the table
Table shows customer name, phone, service, address, and date columns
Data loads correctly from the backend

requirements.text: Include status toggle functionality in the admin dashboard to allow marking bookings as pending or completed
acceptanceCriteria: Each booking row has a status indicator showing pending or completed
Status can be toggled between pending and completed states
Status updates persist in the backend

requirements.text: Add error handling to the admin dashboard to display meaningful error messages if data fails to load or if there are connection issues
acceptanceCriteria: Error states are caught and displayed to the user
Error messages are clear and actionable
Loading states are shown while data is being fetched

constraints: Must maintain existing backend booking data structure and API
Must preserve existing React Query integration for data fetching
Must use TanStack Router for route configuration
nonGoals: Adding authentication or login to the admin dashboard
